author: Anonymous Poet
title: Cannot add to the discussion in Module 1a
question:
I'm working through the problems in module 1a, and per instructions have created my own image, but there isn't a clear way to submit my image & corresponding BSL expression. At least in my view, no one else has posted anything in the discussion, so maybe others are also having this problem?

instructor_answer: Thanks for pointing this out.  I have deleted that item.  But if you've made a good image feel free to post it here!
